title: MB1 wont bind
body:
Hey guys, i accidentally posted this twice already but i really want a solution

I used to have Mouse Button 1 (left click) attached to attack move, until i recently accidentally reset my hotkeys, ever since, I can't left click anything in game unless i hold shift, and i can't bind MB1 to anything, i've tried going into the input.ini file but if i change the attack move the MB1 it just wont change in game. Pleaseeeeeee help, as you can imagine its extremely frustrating.

I also wrote this in help and support but i don't think too many people would see it there. :( halp guys.

replies.body:
You should list what you have for input.ini

But here is how mine looks.

[GameEvents]
evtPlayerAttackMoveClick=[Button 1]  
evtPlayerSelectClick = [Button 3] (button 3 being middle click)

Check these specific settings and see what they are.
I tried yours, it doesn't matter what I have mine as, it just wont bind when i go in game.
I've spent about 6 hours trying to work around it, nothing seems to work. Changed the input.ini too many times to count
